title: My Third Post, Yo!?
subtitle: No subtitle given
author: Dave Jones
content: Welcome to My Blog. _It's a beautiful thing._ I hope you'll have as much fun reading my posts as I have writing them. Well, before we go any further, allow me to introduce myself. I'm Dave Jones. I'm 34, and from Montreal, Canada.

title: My First Post, Yo!
subtitle: This is a subtitle.
description: Happy Pride month! In this tutorial, I'll share a handful of my favourite animation tricks. You'll learn how to build an animated wavy pride flag using CSS keyframes and linear gradients. We'll also see how to make it dynamic using React. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà
